title: Kamala Harris Assails DOJ’s Antitrust Probe of Car Makers Over Emissions
text:
WASHINGTON—California Sen. Kamala Harris asked the Justice Department’s inspector general to investigate why the department opened an antitrust probe of four car companies who struck a deal with California on vehicle-emissions standards.

Ms. Harris, a Democratic presidential candidate, said Friday in a letter to DOJ Inspector General Michael Horowitz that there were “serious questions about whether federal law enforcement is being used to coerce the four auto makers to abandon their efforts to make cleaner, less-polluting...
description: California Sen. Kamala Harris asked the Justice Department’s inspector general to investigate why the department opened an antitrust probe of four car companies who struck a deal with California on vehicle-emissions standards.
